statement.p: Find the area of the quadrilateral shown. The lengths of the four sides (counterclockwise) are \displaystyle{a}={5.1} , \displaystyle{b}={6.3}, \displaystyle{c}={7.3}, and \displaystyle{d}={10.2}, with diagonal from first to third point \displaystyle{e}={8.5}. Measurements are in yards. What is the area of this figure?
